alert.note: Alert for Butler; Edmonson; Grayson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Butler, southwestern Grayson and northwestern Edmonson Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Leitchfield, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Grayson, northwestern Edmonson and northeastern Butler Counties, including the following locations... Decker, Ready, Millwood, Shrewsbury, Tilford, South, Caneyville, Nash, Peth and Lee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
